titleStmt.title: To His Most Sacred Maiestie, Charles the Second, by the grace of God, of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, King, defender of the faith, &c. The humble congratulation of the nobilitiy and gentry of the county of Rutland.
titleStmt.author: Buckingham, George Villiers, Duke of, 1628-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Griffin for Robert Pawley and are to be sold at the Rainbow in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Duke of Buckingham [and 49 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
